stimulusHtml: Which of the following actions is LEAST likely to support the studioâ€™s goal?

features.html: A media librarian at a movie studio is planning to save digital video files for archival purposes. The movie studio would like to be able to access full-quality videos if they are needed for future projects.

choicesHtml: Using video file formats that conform to published standards and are supported across many different devices
Using lossy compression software to reduce the size requirements of the data being stored
Using storage media that can be expanded for additional data capacity
Using a system that incorporates redundancy to handle disk failure
